phrases: Norman's getting shipped?
Yes.
It is been decided that it will be tomorrow.
Mom.
What happened to Emma's leg?
Do not worry, it was a clean break.
It will heal back to normal without any scars.
It will probably take a month or two to completely heal.
I hope it is healed by your birthday, Ray.
Make sure to give me that bag later.
Okay.
Let us go back to our home.
What should we do now?
Norman is getting shipped out.
Our rope was taken away.
Emma's leg is broken and she cannot move.
Emma's leg will heal quickly.
We can make more rope!
The escape will happen, so we will make it happen!
But first, Norman.
But why?
Why is Norman getting shipped?
Mom was talking about the next shipment.
When she said the situation changed, she was talking about Norman.
And I cannot believe even Sister...
She was her usual energetic self this morning, too.
She was smiling and doing laundry, like normal.
But now, she is no longer alive anywhere in this world.
Emma.
Do not worry.
All she took was the rope.
What are you saying?
The plan is not over yet.
Your leg will heal.
That is not it!
We have to do something about your shipment!
The escape will succeed.
You are coming with us.
You have to be with us, or else!
Hold on.
I will get you some water.
Norman!
What are we going to do, Ray?
We will have him escape, obviously!
No matter what!
Damn it!
Don. Gilda.
We have to get ready.
We are going to let Norman escape.
Emma.
Ray.
Norman, tomorrow afternoon, escape by yourself.
We are not going to let you die.
Sorry, I cannot do that.
Denied.
To be more precise, tomorrow afternoon, make it seem like you have escaped by yourself.
Disable the tracking device, and pretend to have escaped.
Then, hide in the area until Emma's leg is healed.
And on the day we escape, you will run away with us.
But even if it may not be true, once I run away, the security will get tighter.
That is not a problem.
Judging from the House's caretaking policies, security will not increase much.
Caretaking policies?
One, to let us grow freely and comfortably.
Two, strict confidentiality.
The first point is best for our developing brains.
A healthy child who grew up freely with rich emotions.
That is the minimum obligation for the person in charge of the House.
So that means point two is also...
Yeah.
The demons will not show themselves.
If they rule us with fear, our brains will not develop into what they want.
If they do change the security, they would only increase the number of guards or caretakers.
That is something we can deal with.
No, we will!
Even so...
If they increase the height of the wall to something we cannot climb,
how will you climb over it then?
You can make a ladder while you are hiding or something.
What if they change the tracking device to a more complex one?
If they implant new ones, we will know where they are, so we can just take them out!
We can handle it!
You get it, right?
You do not have to die.
I will supply your food.
We will keep you hidden no matter what.
We can more or less deal with tighter security.
I still have a trump card to outwit Mom!
So live!
Pretend to run away, and with this method...
No.
I cannot do it.
It will not work.
It is not just about security.
If I run, you or Emma might get shipped out in my place.
For one of you to get killed instead of me?
I do not want that at all.
They can have my life.
But I have no intention of giving them anything else.
I will destroy what Mom has plotted and make sure the escape succeeds!
Both of you, thank you.
You should come up with and decide on a plan for after I am gone.
Do not be ridiculous.
Then what were the last six years of my life for?
Sorry.
Damn it!
Then Ray, you should break your leg, too.
It is okay, right?
Yeah, let us break a bone!
Emma, what are you...
You know, since I am hurt so badly, I do not think I will get shipped out in your place.
Remember what the demon at the gate said?
We are high-grade merchandise, and we are also special.
When we go, we have to be in perfect form.
So if they need a replacement, it would be Ray.
So if Ray were hurt badly as well, he would not get shipped out immediately.
That is a great idea.
All right, let us get cracking.
Right?
But would not my arm be enough?
Oh yeah.
Then let us break your arm.
No, wait.
It is not guaranteed that you will not get shipped out if you get hurt.
Then catch a horrible cold.
The demons will not eat me if I am sick, right?
Breaking your arm is super painful and it will be exhausting to be sick, but you will be fine, right?
Yeah.
We can discuss escape plans through string telephones or something.
That is good.
We will not have to worry about Mom hearing us.
But...
If that does not work, we will think of something else.
I will do anything.
Why?
You are crazy for doing this.
It is way better than having you die, Norman.
Do you remember what you said?
We will all escape together, with everyone.
If you are not part of this, I will not accept it!
Let us keep living, together.
Okay, Norman?
Yeah.
Norman.
Use this to disable your tracking device tomorrow, and then go hide in the forest.
And then climb the wall...
Don and Gilda are making new rope right now.
They are using spare sheets stolen from the linen room.
So it is complete.
Press it against your left ear and push the button.
That will disable the tracking device.
With this method, it will not notify Mom.
Did you make that from camera parts?
Not just the camera.
I used parts from all the other rewards I got beforehand.
I just wanted the strobe light from the camera.
You spent six years getting parts from different items so Mom would not figure it out.
Amazing.
It is not amazing or anything.
After I realized the secret of the House, I had to do it.
That is all.
Ray.
How did you find out about the House's secret?
I asked you about it before, too.
Because normally, no one would find out.
From the beginning.
I knew from the beginning.
Do you know what infantile amnesia is?
What is that?
Without being aware, people forget their memories from when they were a baby.
That is infantile amnesia.
In rare cases, it does not happen to some people.
Ray, do you mean...
I have memories from when I was a fetus.
There were inconsistencies between my own memories and my life at this House.
That is how I found out.
My first memory is being inside a dark, warm liquid.
A lullaby I could hear from a distance.
How much do you remember?
It is in fragments, but highly detailed.
I remember how the demons looked, and that there were other babies.
The tracking devices were implanted, and we were divided into groups of five.
Groups of five...
After that, I passed through a dark tunnel and arrived here.
The tunnel being the gate?
Yeah.
Wait.
So past the gate is not the outside, but...
Headquarters.
The headquarters and the adjacent five plants.
That is what makes this House.
So what Sister said was true, after all.
The gate will not serve as an escape route.
Beyond that is not just a few guards out there.
It is swarming with demons and adults.
Is not that bad?
No.
That is why the security towards us is light.
They will only focus on the gate and will not increase security.
Once Emma's leg is healed, we will escape.
I see.
There is no need to be afraid.
Tomorrow, you will disappear.
Got it.
Listen up, everyone.
I have good news.
A foster family has been decided for Norman.
I know this is sudden, but he is leaving tomorrow night.
Tomorrow?
Congratulations!
Congratulations, Norman!
Is this goodbye?
This suddenly?
We are going to miss him, huh?
Congratulations!
Congwats!
Let us play a lot tomorrow!
- We will miss you.
- Congratulations.
- Congratulations.
- Congratulations!
- Congratulations, Norman! - Please do not go.
Congratulations...
Norman... congratulations!
Thanks, everyone.
Please write us letters.
It is kind of sad though.
She is still crying.
Okay, let us eat dinner.
Ba-baam!
Ba-ba-baam!
- That felt good.
- Hey, Mom.
What is this?
Do not worry.
It will go as planned.
Norman.
Phew, I am tired.
That was fun.
Where is Norman?
Norman.
Why?
You bastard, what the hell?
You can still run away!
No.
I have no intention of running away.
Anyway, I want you to listen.
It was a cliff.
Past the wall...
